trans-unit.source: The MaxThreads directive sets the desired maximum number worker threads allowable. The default value is also the compiled in hard limit. Therefore it can only be lowered, for example:
trans-unit.target: 该 MaxThreads 指令集所需的最大数量的工作线程允许的。默认值也是编译硬限制。因此只能降低它，例如：

trans-unit.source: The MimeMagicFile directive can be used to enable this module, the default file is distributed at conf/magic. Non-rooted paths are relative to the ServerRoot. Virtual hosts will use the same file as the main server unless a more specific setting is used, in which case the more specific setting overrides the main server's file.
trans-unit.target: 该 MimeMagicFile 指令可以用来启用此模块，默认的文件是在分布式 conf/magic 。无根路径是相对于 ServerRoot 的。除非使用更特定的设置，否则虚拟主机将使用与主服务器相同的文件，在这种情况下，更特定的设置将覆盖主服务器的文件。

trans-unit.source: The MinSpareServers directive sets the desired minimum number of idle child server processes. An idle process is one which is not handling a request. If there are fewer than MinSpareServers idle, then the parent process creates new children: It will spawn one, wait a second, then spawn two, wait a second, then spawn four, and it will continue exponentially until it is spawning 32 children per second. It will stop whenever it satisfies the MinSpareServers setting.
trans-unit.target: 该 MinSpareServers 指令设置的所需的最小数量的空闲子服务器进程。空闲进程是不处理请求的进程。如果空闲的少于 MinSpareServers ，则父进程将创建新的子进程：它将先生成一个，再等待一秒钟，然后生成两个，再等待一秒钟，再生成四个，然后将以指数方式继续进行，直到每秒每秒生成32个孩子。 。只要满足 MinSpareServers 设置，它将停止。

trans-unit.source: The ModMimeUsePathInfo directive is used to combine the filename with the path_info URL component to apply mod_mime's directives to the request. The default value is Off - therefore, the path_info component is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 ModMimeUsePathInfo 指令用于与文件名结合 path_info URL组件应用 mod_mime 的指令请求。默认值为“ Off -因此，会忽略 path_info 组件。

trans-unit.source: The Mutex directive can be used to change the underlying implementation used for mutexes, in order to relieve functional or performance problems with APR's default choice.
trans-unit.target: 该 Mutex 指令可以用来改变用于互斥体的底层实现，为了缓解与功能或性能的问题APR的默认选择。

trans-unit.source: The Mutex directive is typically used in the following exceptional situations:
trans-unit.target: 该 Mutex 指令通常用在以下例外情况：

trans-unit.source: The Mutex directive sets the mechanism, and optionally the lock file location, that httpd and modules use to serialize access to resources. Specify default as the second argument to change the settings for all mutexes; specify a mutex name (see table below) as the second argument to override defaults only for that mutex.
trans-unit.target: 该 Mutex 指令设置的机制，以及可选的锁文件的位置，即httpd和模块使用串行访问的资源。将 default 指定为第二个参数以更改所有互斥锁的设置。指定互斥量名称（请参见下表）作为第二个参数，以仅覆盖该互斥量的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The NameWidth keyword allows you to specify the width of the filename column in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该 NameWidth 关键字允许您指定以字节为单位的文件名列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The NegotiatedOnly option provides that every extension following the base name must correlate to a recognized mod_mime extension for content negotiation, e.g. Charset, Content-Type, Language, or Encoding. This is the strictest implementation with the fewest unexpected side effects, and is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该 NegotiatedOnly 选项提供以下基本名称每个扩展名必须关联到一个公认的 mod_mime 扩展内容协商，如字符集，内容类型，语言或编码。这是最严格的实现，具有最少的意外副作用，并且是默认行为。

trans-unit.source: The Off setting, which is the default, suppresses the footer line (and is therefore compatible with the behavior of Apache-1.2 and below). The On setting simply adds a line with the server version number and ServerName of the serving virtual host, and the EMail setting additionally creates a "mailto:" reference to the ServerAdmin of the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: “ Off 设置是默认设置，它禁止显示页脚行（因此与Apache-1.2及更低版本的行为兼容）。“ On 设置仅添加带有服务器版本号和所服务虚拟主机的 ServerName 的行，而“ EMail 设置还创建一个对引用文档的 ServerAdmin 的“ mailto：”引用。

trans-unit.source: The OmitPID keyword suppresses the addition of the httpd parent process id from the lock file name.
trans-unit.target: 该 OmitPID 关键字抑制除了从锁定的文件名的httpd父进程ID的。

trans-unit.source: The Options directive controls which server features are available in a particular directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 Options 指令控制该服务器功能在特定目录可用。

trans-unit.source: The Order directive controls the order of access directive processing only within each phase of the server's configuration processing. This implies, for example, that an Allow or Deny directive occurring in a <Location> section will always be evaluated after an Allow or Deny directive occurring in a <Directory> section or .htaccess file, regardless of the setting of the Order directive. For details on the merging of configuration sections, see the documentation on How Directory, Location and Files sections work.
trans-unit.target: 该 Order 指令控制访问指令仅在服务器的配置的每个阶段内处理订单。这意味着，例如，一个 Allow 或 Deny 在一个指令中发生 <Location> 部分将总是被评估后的 Allow 或 Deny 在一个指令中发生 <Directory> 部或 .htaccess 文件，而不管的设定的 Order 指令。有关合并配置部分的详细信息，请参阅“ 目录，位置和文件”部分的工作方式文档。

trans-unit.source: The Order directive, along with the Allow and Deny directives, controls a three-pass access control system. The first pass processes either all Allow or all Deny directives, as specified by the Order directive. The second pass parses the rest of the directives (Deny or Allow). The third pass applies to all requests which do not match either of the first two.
trans-unit.target: 该 Order 指令，与沿 Allow 和 Deny 指令，控制三通道门禁控制系统。第一遍处理 Order 指令指定的所有 Allow 指令或所有 Deny 指令。第二遍解析其余指令（ Deny 或 Allow ）。第三遍适用于所有与前两个都不匹配的请求。

trans-unit.source: The OutputSed directive specifies the sed command to execute on the response.
trans-unit.target: 所述 OutputSed 指令指定 sed 命令的响应执行。

trans-unit.source: The PT flag implies the L flag: rewriting will be stopped in order to pass the request to the next phase of processing.
trans-unit.target: 的 PT 标志意味着 L 标志：将重写，以便将请求传递到处理的下一阶段被停止。

trans-unit.source: The PeerExtList(object-ID) function expects to find zero or more instances of the X.509 certificate extension identified by the given object ID (OID) in the client certificate. The expression evaluates to true if the left-hand side string matches exactly against the value of an extension identified with this OID. (If multiple extensions with the same OID are present, at least one extension must match).
trans-unit.target: 所述 PeerExtList(object-ID) 功能希望找到由给定所确定的X.509证书扩展的零个或多个实例对象ID在客户证书中（OID）。如果左侧字符串与与此OID标识的扩展名的值完全匹配，则该表达式的计算结果为true。（如果存在多个具有相同OID的扩展名，则至少一个扩展名必须匹配）。

trans-unit.source: The PidFile directive sets the file to which the server records the process id of the daemon. If the filename is not absolute then it is assumed to be relative to the ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 PidFile 指令设定服务器用于记录守护程序的进程ID文件。如果文件名不是绝对文件名，则假定它是相对于 ServerRoot 的。

trans-unit.source: The PidFile is subject to the same warnings about log file placement and security.
trans-unit.target: 该 PidFile 受有关日志文件的位置和相同的警告信息的安全。

trans-unit.source: The PreservesContentLength keyword specifies that the filter preserves the content length. This is not the default, as most filters change the content length. In the event that the filter doesn't modify the length, this keyword should be specified.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PreservesContentLength 关键字指定的过滤器保留内容长度。这不是默认设置，因为大多数过滤器都会更改内容长度。如果过滤器未修改长度，则应指定此关键字。

trans-unit.source: The PrivilegesMode directive allows you to select either FAST or SECURE mode. You can mix modes, using FAST mode for trusted users and fully-audited code paths, while imposing SECURE mode where an untrusted user has scope to introduce code.
trans-unit.target: 该 PrivilegesMode 指令允许您选择 FAST 或 SECURE 模式。您可以混合模式，对受信任的用户和经过完全审核的代码路径使用 FAST 模式，而在不受信任的用户可以引入代码的范围内使用SECURE模式。

trans-unit.source: The ProtocolEcho directive enables or disables the echo server.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProtocolEcho 指令启用或禁用回声服务器。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyBadHeader directive determines the behavior of mod_proxy if it receives syntactically invalid response header lines (i.e. containing no colon) from the origin server. The following arguments are possible:
trans-unit.target: 如果 ProxyBadHeader 指令从源服务器接收到语法上无效的响应头行（即，不包含冒号），则它确定 mod_proxy 的行为。以下参数是可能的：

trans-unit.source: The ProxyBlock directive specifies a list of words, hosts and/or domains, separated by spaces. HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP document requests to sites whose names contain matched words, hosts or domains are blocked by the proxy server. The proxy module will also attempt to determine IP addresses of list items which may be hostnames during startup, and cache them for match test as well. That may slow down the startup time of the server.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyBlock 指令指定的话，主机和/或结构域，由空格分隔的列表。对名称包含匹配的单词，主机或域的站点的HTTP，HTTPS和FTP文档请求被代理服务器阻止。代理模块还将尝试确定列表项的IP地址，这些列表项可能是启动期间的主机名，并且也将其缓存以进行匹配测试。这可能会减慢服务器的启动时间。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyExpressDBMFile directive points to the location of the Express map DBM file. This file serves to map the incoming server name, obtained from the Host: header, to a backend URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyExpressDBMFile 指令指向快递地图DBM文件的位置。该文件用于将从Host：标头获得的传入服务器名称映射到后端URL。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyExpressDBMType directive controls the DBM type expected by the module. The default is the default DBM type created with httxt2dbm.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyExpressDBMType 指令控制由模块预期DBM类型。默认值是使用 httxt2dbm 创建的默认DBM类型。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyExpressEnable directive controls whether the module will be active.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyExpressEnable 指令控制该模块是否会被激活。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyFtpDirCharset directive defines the character set to be set for FTP directory listings in HTML generated by mod_proxy_ftp.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyFtpDirCharset 指令定义的字符集通过生成HTML FTP目录列表进行设置 mod_proxy_ftp 模块。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyFtpEscapeWildcards directive controls whether wildcard characters ("*?[{~") in requested filenames are escaped with backslash before sending them to the FTP server. That is the default behavior, but many FTP servers don't know about the escaping and try to serve the literal filenames they were sent, including the backslashes in the names.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyFtpEscapeWildcards 指令控制是否通配符（“*？[{〜”）中要求的文件名它们发送到FTP服务器之前用反斜杠转义。这是默认行为，但是许多FTP服务器不知道转义，而是尝试提供发送的原义文件名，包括名称中的反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyFtpListOnWildcard directive controls whether wildcard characters ("*?[{~") in requested filenames cause mod_proxy_ftp to return a listing of files instead of downloading a file. By default (value on), they do.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyFtpListOnWildcard 指令控制是否通配符（“*？[{〜”）中要求的文件名事业 mod_proxy_ftp 模块返回文件的列表，而不是下载文件。默认情况下（启用值），它们会执行。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyHCExpr directive allows for creating a named condition expression that checks the response headers of the backend server to determine its health. This named condition can then be assigned to balancer members via the hcexpr parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyHCExpr 指令允许创建一个名为条件表达式检查后端服务器的响应头，以确定其健康状况。然后可以通过 hcexpr 参数将此命名条件分配给平衡器成员。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyHCTemplate directive allows for creating a named set (template) of health check parameters that can then be assigned to balancer members via the hctemplate parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxyHCTemplate 指令允许创建的然后可以通过分配到平衡器成员健康检查参数的命名集（模板） hctemplate 参数。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyIOBufferSize directive adjusts the size of the internal buffer which is used as a scratchpad for the data between input and output. The size must be at least 512.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyIOBufferSize 指令调整其被用作输入和输出之间的数据的暂存器中的内部缓冲器的大小。大小必须至少为 512 。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyMaxForwards directive specifies the maximum number of proxies through which a request may pass if there's no Max-Forwards header supplied with the request. This may be set to prevent infinite proxy loops or a DoS attack.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyMaxForwards 指令指定代理的最大数量，通过该如果没有请求可以通过 Max-Forwards 报头与所述请求中提供。可以设置此项以防止无限代理循环或DoS攻击。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyReceiveBufferSize directive specifies an explicit (TCP/IP) network buffer size for proxied HTTP and FTP connections, for increased throughput. It has to be greater than 512 or set to 0 to indicate that the system's default buffer size should be used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyReceiveBufferSize 指令指定的显式（TCP / IP）网络缓冲区大小为代理的HTTP和FTP连接，以增加吞吐量。它必须大于 512 或设置为 0 以指示应使用系统的默认缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyRemoteMatch is identical to the ProxyRemote directive, except that the first argument is a regular expression match against the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ProxyRemoteMatch 是相同的 ProxyRemote 指令，所不同的是第一个参数是一个正则表达式对所请求的URL的匹配。

trans-unit.source: The ProxySCGIInternalRedirect enables the backend to internally redirect the gateway to a different URL. This feature originates in mod_cgi, which internally redirects the response if the response status is OK (200) and the response contains a Location (or configured alternate header) and its value starts with a slash (/). This value is interpreted as a new local URL that Apache httpd internally redirects to.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxySCGIInternalRedirect 使后端到网关内部重定向到一个不同的URL。此功能起源于 mod_cgi ，如果响应状态为 OK （ 200 ）并且响应包含 Location （或配置的备用标头）并且其值以斜杠（ / ）开头，则该模块在内部重定向响应。该值被解释为Apache httpd内部重定向到的新本地URL。

trans-unit.source: The ProxySCGISendfile argument determines the gateway behaviour:
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxySCGISendfile 参数确定网关行为：

trans-unit.source: The ProxySCGISendfile directive enables the SCGI backend to let files be served directly by the gateway. This is useful for performance purposes — httpd can use sendfile or other optimizations, which are not possible if the file comes over the backend socket. Additionally, the file contents are not transmitted twice.
trans-unit.target: 该 ProxySCGISendfile 指令使SCGI的后端，让文件由网关直接服务。这对于提高性能很有用 sendfile 可以使用sendfile或其他优化，如果文件来自后端套接字，则不可能。此外，文件内容不会发送两次。

trans-unit.source: The RLimit* directives are used to limit the amount of resources which can be used by processes forked off from the httpd children. In particular, this will control resources used by CGI scripts and SSI exec commands.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RLimit *指令用于限制可以通过从子httpd分叉关闭过程中使用的资源量。特别是，这将控制CGI脚本和SSI exec命令使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: The ReadmeName directive sets the name of the file that will be appended to the end of the index listing. Filename is the name of the file to include, and is taken to be relative to the location being indexed. If Filename begins with a slash, as in example 2, it will be taken to be relative to the DocumentRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 ReadmeName 指令集将追加到索引列表的末尾文件的名称。 Filename 是要包含的文件的名称，并且被视为相对于要建立索引的位置而言。如果 Filename 以斜杠开头，如示例2所示，它将被视为相对于 DocumentRoot 。

trans-unit.source: The Redirect directive maps an old URL into a new one by asking the client to refetch the resource at the new location.
trans-unit.target: 该 Redirect 指令通过询问客户在新的位置重新获取资源映射旧网址进入一个新的。

trans-unit.source: The RegisteredMethods option should not be toggled for forward proxy hosts, as the methods supported by the origin servers are unknown to the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 该 RegisteredMethods 选项应该不会被切换为转发代理主机，由原始服务器所支持的方法是未知的代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPProxyProtocol directive enables or disables the reading and handling of the PROXY protocol connection header. If enabled with the On flag, the upstream client must send the header every time it opens a connection or the connection will be aborted unless it is in the list of disabled hosts provided by the RemoteIPProxyProtocolExceptions directive.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RemoteIPProxyProtocol 指令允许或禁止的读出和处理PROXY协议连接头部的。如果启用了 On 标志，则上游客户端每次打开连接时都必须发送标头，否则该连接将被中止，除非它在 RemoteIPProxyProtocolExceptions 指令提供的禁用主机列表中。

trans-unit.source: The RemoteIPProxyProtocol directive enables or disables the reading and handling of the PROXY protocol connection header. Sometimes it is desirable to require clients to provide the PROXY header, but permit other clients to connect without it. This directive allows a server administrator to configure a single host or CIDR range of hosts that may do so. This is generally useful for monitoring and administrative traffic to a virtual host direct to the server behind the upstream load balancer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RemoteIPProxyProtocol 指令允许或禁止的读出和处理PROXY协议连接头部的。有时，要求客户端提供PROXY标头，但允许其他客户端在没有它的情况下进行连接是理想的。该指令允许服务器管理员配置单个主机或CIDR范围内的主机。这通常对于监视和管理到虚拟主机的流量（直接流向上游负载均衡器后面的服务器）非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveCharset directive removes any character set associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveCharset 指令删除任何字符集的关联与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveEncoding directive removes any encoding associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files. An example of its use might be:
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveEncoding 指令删除任何编码协会与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。其用法的一个示例可能是：

trans-unit.source: The RemoveHandler directive removes any handler associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files. An example of its use might be:
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveHandler 指令删除任何处理协会与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。其用法的一个示例可能是：

trans-unit.source: The RemoveInputFilter directive removes any input filter associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveInputFilter 指令删除任何输入滤波协会与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveLanguage directive removes any language associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveLanguage 指令删除任何语言协会与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveOutputFilter directive removes any output filter associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files.
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveOutputFilter 指令删除任何输出滤波协会与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。

trans-unit.source: The RemoveType directive removes any media type associations for files with the given extensions. This allows .htaccess files in subdirectories to undo any associations inherited from parent directories or the server config files. An example of its use might be:
trans-unit.target: 该 RemoveType 指令删除任何媒体类型的关联与给定扩展名的文件。这允许子目录中的 .htaccess 文件撤消从父目录或服务器配置文件继承的任何关联。其用法的一个示例可能是：

trans-unit.source: The RequestHeader directive may be followed by an additional argument, which may be any of:
trans-unit.target: 所述 RequestHeader 指令之后可以是一个额外的参数，其可以是任何的：

trans-unit.source: The Require ldap-attribute directive allows the administrator to grant access based on attributes of the authenticated user in the LDAP directory. If the attribute in the directory matches the value given in the configuration, access is granted.
trans-unit.target: 该 Require ldap-attribute 指令允许基于LDAP目录中的身份验证的用户的属性管理员授予访问权限。如果目录中的属性与配置中给定的值匹配，则授予访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The Require ldap-dn directive allows the administrator to grant access based on distinguished names. It specifies a DN that must match for access to be granted. If the distinguished name that was retrieved from the directory server matches the distinguished name in the Require ldap-dn, then authorization is granted. Note: do not surround the distinguished name with quotes.
trans-unit.target: 该 Require ldap-dn 指令允许基于专有名称的管理员授予访问权限。它指定必须匹配才能授予访问权限的DN。如果从目录服务器检索的专有名称与 Require ldap-dn 中的专有名称匹配，则将授予授权。注意：专有名称不要用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: The Require ldap-filter directive allows the administrator to grant access based on a complex LDAP search filter. If the dn returned by the filter search matches the authenticated user dn, access is granted.
trans-unit.target: 该 Require ldap-filter 指令允许基于复杂的LDAP搜索过滤器的管理员授予访问权限。如果过滤器搜索返回的dn与经过身份验证的用户dn匹配，则授予访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The Require ldap-user directive specifies what usernames can access the resource. Once mod_authnz_ldap has retrieved a unique DN from the directory, it does an LDAP compare operation using the username specified in the Require ldap-user to see if that username is part of the just-fetched LDAP entry. Multiple users can be granted access by putting multiple usernames on the line, separated with spaces. If a username has a space in it, then it must be surrounded with double quotes. Multiple users can also be granted access by using multiple Require ldap-user directives, with one user per line. For example, with a AuthLDAPURL of ldap://ldap/o=Example?cn (i.e., cn is used for searches), the following Require directives could be used to restrict access:
trans-unit.target: 该 Require ldap-user 指令指定的用户名什么可以访问的资源。一旦 mod_authnz_ldap 从目录中检索到唯一的DN，它将使用 Require ldap-user 中指定的用户名执行LDAP比较操作，以查看该用户名是否为刚获取的LDAP条目的一部分。通过将多个用户名放在行中并用空格分隔，可以授予多个用户访问权限。如果用户名中有空格，则必须用双引号将其引起来。还可以通过使用多个 Require ldap-user 指令（每行一个用户）来授予多个用户访问权限。例如，具有 AuthLDAPURL 的 ldap://ldap/o=Example?cn （即， cn 用于搜索），以下Require指令可用于限制访问：

trans-unit.source: The RewriteBase directive specifies the URL prefix to be used for per-directory (htaccess) RewriteRule directives that substitute a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 的 RewriteBase 指令指定要用于每目录（htaccess的）URL前缀 RewriteRule 指示该代用品的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteCond directive defines a rule condition. One or more RewriteCond can precede a RewriteRule directive. The following rule is then only used if both the current state of the URI matches its pattern, and if these conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteCond 指令定义了一个规则的条件。一个或多个 RewriteCond 可以位于 RewriteRule 指令之前。然后，仅当URI的当前状态与它的模式都匹配并且满足这些条件时，才使用以下规则。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteEngine directive enables or disables the runtime rewriting engine. If it is set to off this module does no runtime processing at all. It does not even update the SCRIPT_URx environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteEngine 叙述指令启用或禁用运行时重写引擎。如果将其设置为 off 此模块完全不执行任何运行时处理。它甚至不更新 SCRIPT_URx 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteMap directive defines a Rewriting Map which can be used inside rule substitution strings by the mapping-functions to insert/substitute fields through a key lookup. The source of this lookup can be of various types.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RewriteMap 指令指令定义一个重写地图可以规则替换字符串内由映射函数被用于插入通过键查找/替代的字段。查找的来源可以有多种类型。

trans-unit.source: The RewriteOptions directive sets some special options for the current per-server or per-directory configuration. The Option string can currently only be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteOptions 指令集当前每服务器或者每目录配置一些特殊选项。该选项字符串目前只能是以下情况之一：

trans-unit.source: The RewriteRule directive is the real rewriting workhorse. The directive can occur more than once, with each instance defining a single rewrite rule. The order in which these rules are defined is important - this is the order in which they will be applied at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 该 RewriteRule 指令才是真正改写主力。该指令可以多次出现，每个实例定义一个重写规则。定义这些规则的顺序很重要-这是它们在运行时应用的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The SSIETag directive suppresses this behaviour, and allows the server to generate an ETag header. This can be used to enable caching of the output. Note that a backend server or dynamic content generator may generate an ETag of its own, ignoring no-etag, and this ETag will be passed by mod_include regardless of the value of this setting. SSIETag can take on the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该 SSIETag 指令禁止这种行为，并允许服务器生成 ETag 的头。这可用于启用输出缓存。请注意，后端服务器或动态内容生成器可能会生成自己的ETag，而忽略 no-etag ，并且无论此设置的值如何，此ETag都会由 mod_include 传递。 SSIETag 可以采用以下值：

trans-unit.source: The SSIErrorMsg directive changes the error message displayed when mod_include encounters an error. For production servers you may consider changing the default error message to "<!-- Error -->" so that the message is not presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当 mod_include 遇到错误时， SSIErrorMsg 指令更改显示的错误消息。对于生产服务器，您可以考虑将默认错误消息更改为 "<!-- Error -->" 以使该消息不会显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: The SSILastModified directive overrides this behaviour, and allows the Last-Modified header to be respected if already present, or set if the header is not already present. This can be used to enable caching of the output. SSILastModified can take on the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该 SSILastModified 指令覆盖此行为，并允许 Last-Modified 头，如果已经存在的尊重，或者设定如果标题是不存在的。这可用于启用输出缓存。 SSILastModified 可以采用以下值：

trans-unit.source: The SSL_SECURE_RENEG environment variable can be used from an SSI or CGI script to determine whether secure renegotiation is supported for a given SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: 该 SSL_SECURE_RENEG 环境变量可以从SSI或CGI脚本被用来确定安全的重新协商是否支持给定的SSL连接。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptAlias directive has the same behavior as the Alias directive, except that in addition it marks the target directory as containing CGI scripts that will be processed by mod_cgi's cgi-script handler. URLs with a case-sensitive (%-decoded) path beginning with URL-path will be mapped to scripts beginning with the second argument, which is a full pathname in the local filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 该 ScriptAlias 指令,指令具有相同的行为作为 Alias 指令，但是，除了它标志着目标目录作为包含CGI脚本将被处理 mod_cgi 一样的CGI脚本处理程序。具有以 URL-path path开头的区分大小写（％解码）路径的URL将被映射到以第二个参数开头的脚本，该参数是本地文件系统中的完整路径名。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptLog directive sets the CGI script error logfile. If no ScriptLog is given, no error log is created. If given, any CGI errors are logged into the filename given as argument. If this is a relative file or path it is taken relative to the ServerRoot.
trans-unit.target: 该 ScriptLog 指令设置CGI脚本错误日志文件。如果未提供 ScriptLog ，则不会创建错误日志。如果给出，则任何CGI错误都将记录到作为参数给出的文件名中。如果这是相对文件或路径，则相对于 ServerRoot 采取。

trans-unit.source: The ServerAdmin sets the contact address that the server includes in any error messages it returns to the client. If the httpd doesn't recognize the supplied argument as an URL, it assumes, that it's an email-address and prepends it with mailto: in hyperlink targets. However, it's recommended to actually use an email address, since there are a lot of CGI scripts that make that assumption. If you want to use an URL, it should point to another server under your control. Otherwise users may not be able to contact you in case of errors.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ServerAdmin 设置联系人地址，所述服务器在它返回到客户端的任何错误消息包括。如果 httpd 不能将提供的参数识别为URL，则假定它是一个 email-address 并在超链接目标中添加 mailto: ：。但是，建议使用实际的电子邮件地址，因为有许多CGI脚本可以进行此假设。如果要使用URL，则它应指向您控制下的另一台服务器。否则，如果出现错误，用户可能无法与您联系。

trans-unit.source: The ServerAlias directive sets the alternate names for a host, for use with name-based virtual hosts. The ServerAlias may include wildcards, if appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerAlias 指令设置备用名称为主机，与使用基于域名的虚拟主机。该 ServerAlias 可以包含通配符，如果合适的话。

trans-unit.source: The ServerName directive may appear anywhere within the definition of a server. However, each appearance overrides the previous appearance (within that server).
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerName 指令可能会出现一个服务器的定义内的任何地方。但是，每个外观都会覆盖先前的外观（在该服务器内）。

trans-unit.source: The ServerName directive sets the request scheme, hostname and port that the server uses to identify itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerName 指令设置请求方案，主机名和端口服务器用于标识自身。

trans-unit.source: The ServerPath directive sets the legacy URL pathname for a host, for use with name-based virtual hosts.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerPath 指令设置传统的URL路径为主机，与使用基于域名的虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: The ServerRoot directive sets the directory in which the server lives. Typically it will contain the subdirectories conf/ and logs/. Relative paths in other configuration directives (such as Include or LoadModule, for example) are taken as relative to this directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerRoot 的指令集的服务器所居住的目录。通常，它将包含子目录 conf/ 和 logs/ 。其他配置指令（例如 Include 或 LoadModule ）中的相对路径被视为相对于此目录。

trans-unit.source: The ServerSignature directive allows the configuration of a trailing footer line under server-generated documents (error messages, mod_proxy ftp directory listings, mod_info output, ...). The reason why you would want to enable such a footer line is that in a chain of proxies, the user often has no possibility to tell which of the chained servers actually produced a returned error message.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServerSignature 指令允许在服务器生成的文档（错误信息，后躯线的配置 mod_proxy 的 ftp目录列表， mod_info 输出，...）。之所以要启用这样的页脚行，是因为在代理链中，用户通常无法分辨哪个链式服务器实际产生了返回的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The Session directive enables a session for the directory or location container. Further directives control where the session will be stored and how privacy is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 该 Session 指令允许的目录或位置容器会话。其他指令控制会话的存储位置以及如何维护隐私。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCookieName2 directive specifies the name and optional attributes of an RFC2965 compliant cookie inside which the session will be stored. RFC2965 cookies are set using the Set-Cookie2 HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionCookieName2 指令指定的名称和RFC2965兼容的cookie里面的会议将被存储其中的可选属性。RFC2965 cookie使用 Set-Cookie2 HTTP标头设置。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCookieName directive specifies the name and optional attributes of an RFC2109 compliant cookie inside which the session will be stored. RFC2109 cookies are set using the Set-Cookie HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionCookieName 指令指定的名称和RFC2109兼容的cookie里面的会议将被存储其中的可选属性。使用 Set-Cookie HTTP标头设置 RFC2109 cookie 。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCookieRemove flag controls whether the cookies containing the session will be removed from the headers during request processing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SessionCookieRemove 标志控制是否包含会话饼干将从报头请求处理过程中被除去。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCryptoCipher directive allows the cipher to be used during encryption. If not specified, the cipher defaults to aes256.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionCryptoCipher 指令允许在加密过程中使用的密码。如果未指定，则密码默认为 aes256 。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCryptoDriver directive specifies the name of the crypto driver to be used for encryption. If not specified, the driver defaults to the recommended driver compiled into APR-util.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionCryptoDriver 用于加密的加密驱动器的指令指定的名称。如果未指定，则驱动程序默认为编译为APR-util的推荐驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCryptoPassphrase directive specifies the keys to be used to enable symmetrical encryption on the contents of the session before writing the session, or decrypting the contents of the session after reading the session.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SessionCryptoPassphrase 指令指定键被用于写入会话，或读取会话之后解密所述会话的内容之前，以使该会话的内容对称加密。

trans-unit.source: The SessionCryptoPassphraseFile directive specifies the name of a configuration file containing the keys to use for encrypting or decrypting the session, specified one per line. The file is read on server start, and a graceful restart will be necessary for httpd to pick up changes to the keys.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SessionCryptoPassphraseFile 包含密钥用于加密或解密所述会话的配置文件的指令指定的名称，指定每行一个。在服务器启动时会读取该文件，因此，httpd需要正常重启才能获取对密钥的更改。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDCookieName2 directive specifies the name and optional attributes of an RFC2965 compliant cookie inside which the session ID will be stored. RFC2965 cookies are set using the Set-Cookie2 HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDCookieName2 指令指定的名称和RFC2965兼容的cookie里面的会话ID将被存储其中的可选属性。RFC2965 cookie使用 Set-Cookie2 HTTP标头设置。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDCookieName directive specifies the name and optional attributes of an RFC2109 compliant cookie inside which the session ID will be stored. RFC2109 cookies are set using the Set-Cookie HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDCookieName 指令指定的名称和RFC2109兼容的cookie里面的会话ID将被存储其中的可选属性。使用 Set-Cookie HTTP标头设置 RFC2109 cookie 。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDCookieRemove flag controls whether the cookies containing the session ID will be removed from the headers during request processing.
trans-unit.target: SessionDBDCookieRemove 标志控制在请求处理期间是否将从头中删除包含会话ID的cookie。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDDeleteLabel directive sets the default delete query label to be used to delete an expired or empty session. This label must have been previously defined using the DBDPrepareSQL directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDDeleteLabel 使用指令集的默认删除查询标签，删除过期或空会话。此标签必须事先使用 DBDPrepareSQL 指令定义。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDInsertLabel directive sets the default insert query label to be used to load in a session. This label must have been previously defined using the DBDPrepareSQL directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDInsertLabel 指令设置默认的插入查询标签，在会话中使用的负载。此标签必须事先使用 DBDPrepareSQL 指令定义。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDPerUser flag enables a per user session keyed against the user's login name. If the user is not logged in, this directive will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDPerUser 标志启用键对用户的登录名以每用户会话。如果用户未登录，则该指令将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDSelectLabel directive sets the default select query label to be used to load in a session. This label must have been previously defined using the DBDPrepareSQL directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDSelectLabel 指令集的默认选择查询标签，可用于负载的会话。此标签必须事先使用 DBDPrepareSQL 指令定义。

trans-unit.source: The SessionDBDUpdateLabel directive sets the default update query label to be used to load in a session. This label must have been previously defined using the DBDPrepareSQL directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionDBDUpdateLabel 指令设定用于负载会话中的默认更新查询标签。此标签必须事先使用 DBDPrepareSQL 指令定义。

trans-unit.source: The SessionExclude directive allows sessions to be disabled relative to URL prefixes only. This can be used to make a website more efficient, by targeting a more precise URL space for which a session should be maintained. By default, all URLs within the directory or location are included in the session. The SessionExclude directive takes precedence over the SessionInclude directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionExclude 指令允许会话相对于仅URL前缀残疾人是。通过定位应为其维护会话的更精确的URL空间，这可用于使网站更高效。默认情况下，目录或位置中的所有URL都包含在会话中。该 SessionExclude 指令优先于 SessionInclude 指令。

trans-unit.source: The SessionHeader directive defines the name of an HTTP response header which, if present, will be parsed and written to the current session.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SessionHeader 指令定义的HTTP响应报头，如果存在的话，将被解析并写入到当前会话的名称。

trans-unit.source: The SessionInclude directive allows sessions to be made valid for specific URL prefixes only. This can be used to make a website more efficient, by targeting a more precise URL space for which a session should be maintained. By default, all URLs within the directory or location are included in the session.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionInclude 指令允许进行有效，只为特定的URL前缀会议。通过定位应为其维护会话的更精确的URL空间，这可用于使网站更高效。默认情况下，目录或位置中的所有URL都包含在会话中。

trans-unit.source: The SessionMaxAge directive defines a time limit for which a session will remain valid. When a session is saved, this time limit is reset and an existing session can be continued. If a session becomes older than this limit without a request to the server to refresh the session, the session will time out and be removed. Where a session is used to stored user login details, this has the effect of logging the user out automatically after the given time.
trans-unit.target: 该 SessionMaxAge 指令定义的时间限制其会话仍然有效。保存会话后，将重置此时间限制，并且可以继续现有会话。如果会话的时间早于此限制，而没有请求服务器刷新会话的会话，则该会话将超时并被删除。如果使用会话来存储用户登录详细信息，则具有在给定时间后自动注销用户的作用。

trans-unit.source: The SetEnvIf directive defines environment variables based on attributes of the request. The attribute specified in the first argument can be one of four things:
trans-unit.target: 该 SetEnvIf 之后指令定义基于请求的属性的环境变量。在第一个参数中指定的属性可以是以下四种之一：

trans-unit.source: The SetEnvIfExpr directive defines environment variables based on an <If>ap_expr. These expressions will be evaluated at runtime, and applied env-variable in the same fashion as SetEnvIf.
trans-unit.target: 在 SetEnvIfExpr 基于一个指令定义的环境变量 <If> ap_expr 。这些表达式将在运行时求值，并以与 SetEnvIf 相同的方式应用env-variable。

trans-unit.source: The SetEnvIfNoCase is semantically identical to the SetEnvIf directive, and differs only in that the regular expression matching is performed in a case-insensitive manner. For example:
trans-unit.target: 所述 SetEnvIfNoCase 在语义上等同于 SetEnvIf 之后的指令，并仅在该正则表达式匹配是在不区分大小写的方式执行不同。例如：

trans-unit.source: The SetInputFilter directive sets the filter or filters which will process client requests and POST input when they are received by the server. This is in addition to any filters defined elsewhere, including the AddInputFilter directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SetInputFilter 指令设置过滤器或当它们被服务器接收，这将处理客户端请求和POST输入滤波器。这是在其他地方定义的所有过滤器的补充，包括 AddInputFilter 指令。

trans-unit.source: The SetOutputFilter directive sets the filters which will process responses from the server before they are sent to the client. This is in addition to any filters defined elsewhere, including the AddOutputFilter directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SetOutputFilter 指令设置它们被发送到客户端之前，将处理来自服务器的响应的过滤器。这是在其他地方定义的所有过滤器的补充，包括 AddOutputFilter 指令。

trans-unit.source: The StartServers directive sets the number of child server processes created on startup. As the number of processes is dynamically controlled depending on the load, (see MinSpareThreads, MaxSpareThreads, MinSpareServers, MaxSpareServers) there is usually little reason to adjust this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 StartServers 的指令设置在启动时建立的子服务器进程的数量。由于进程数量是根据负载动态控制的（请参见 MinSpareThreads ， MaxSpareThreads ， MinSpareServers 和 MaxSpareServers ），因此通常没有理由调整此参数。

trans-unit.source: The Substitute directive specifies a search and replace pattern to apply to the response body.
trans-unit.target: 该 Substitute 指令指定适用于响应正文搜索和替换模式。

trans-unit.source: The SuexecUserGroup directive allows you to specify a user and group for CGI programs to run as. Non-CGI requests are still processed with the user specified in the User directive.
trans-unit.target: 该 SuexecUserGroup 指令允许你指定一个用户和组的CGI程序运行方式。非CGI请求仍将由 User 指令中指定的用户处理。

trans-unit.source: The ThreadStackSize directive sets the size of the stack (for autodata) of threads which handle client connections and call modules to help process those connections. In most cases the operating system default for stack size is reasonable, but there are some conditions where it may need to be adjusted:
trans-unit.target: 所述 ThreadStackSize 线程指令集的栈（用于汽车数据）的大小，其手柄的客户端连接和呼叫模块以帮助处理这些连接。在大多数情况下，操作系统默认的堆栈大小是合理的，但是在某些情况下可能需要对其进行调整：

trans-unit.source: The TimeOut directive defines the length of time Apache httpd will wait for I/O in various circumstances:
trans-unit.target: 该 TimeOut 指令定义时间的Apache httpd的长度将等待I /在各种情况下○：

trans-unit.source: The Type keyword allows you to specify the MIME content-type of the generated page. The default is text/html.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Type 关键字可以指定所生成页面的MIME内容类型。默认值为 text/html 。

trans-unit.source: The TypesConfig directive sets the location of the media types configuration file. File-path is relative to the ServerRoot. This file sets the default list of mappings from filename extensions to content types. Most administrators use the mime.types file provided by their OS, which associates common filename extensions with the official list of IANA registered media types maintained at http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/index.html as well as a large number of unofficial types. This simplifies the httpd.conf file by providing the majority of media-type definitions, and may be overridden by AddType directives as needed. You should not edit the mime.types file, because it may be replaced when you upgrade your server.
trans-unit.target: 该 TypesConfig 指令设置的位置的媒体类型的配置文件。 File-path 是相对于 ServerRoot 的。该文件设置从文件扩展名到内容类型的默认映射列表。大多数管理员使用 mime.types 通过他们的操作系统，其共同文件扩展名与IANA的正式名单提供关联文件中注册维持在媒体类型http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/index.html以及作为大量的非官方类型。通过提供大多数媒体类型定义，这简化了 httpd.conf 文件，并且可以被 AddType 覆盖。根据需要的指令。您不应编辑 mime.types 文件，因为升级服务器时可能会替换该文件。

trans-unit.source: The TypesConfig directive sets the location of the media types configuration file. File-path is relative to the ServerRoot. This file sets the default list of mappings from filename extensions to content types. Most administrators use the mime.types file provided by their OS, which associates common filename extensions with the official list of IANA registered media types maintained at http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/index.html as well as a large number of unofficial types. This simplifies the httpd.conf file by providing the majority of media-type definitions, and may be overridden by AddType directives as needed. You should not edit the mime.types file, because it may be replaced when you upgrade your server.

The UNIQUE_ID environment variable is constructed by encoding the 144-bit (32-bit IP address, 32 bit pid, 32 bit time stamp, 16 bit counter, 32 bit thread index) quadruple using the alphabet [A-Za-z0-9@-] in a manner similar to MIME base64 encoding, producing 24 characters. The MIME base64 alphabet is actually [A-Za-z0-9+/] however + and / need to be specially encoded in URLs, which makes them less desirable. All values are encoded in network byte ordering so that the encoding is comparable across architectures of different byte ordering. The actual ordering of the encoding is: time stamp, IP address, pid, counter. This ordering has a purpose, but it should be emphasized that applications should not dissect the encoding. Applications should treat the entire encoded UNIQUE_ID as an opaque token, which can be compared against other UNIQUE_IDs for equality only.
trans-unit.target: 所述 UNIQUE_ID 环境变量是通过使用字母编码144位（32位的IP地址，32比特的PID，32位的时间标记，16位计数器，32位的线程索引）四联构造 [A-Za-z0-9@-] 类似于MIME base64编码，产生24个字符。MIME base64字母实际上是 [A-Za-z0-9+/] ,但是 + 和 / 需要在URL中进行特殊编码，因此不太理想。所有值均以网络字节顺序编码，因此在不同字节顺序的体系结构中，该编码具有可比性。编码的实际顺序为：时间戳，IP地址，PID，计数器。这种排序是有目的的，但是应该强调的是，应用程序不应剖析编码。应用程序应将整个编码后的 UNIQUE_ID 视为不透明令牌，可以将其与其他 UNIQUE_ID 进行比较，以确保相等。

trans-unit.source: The USR1 or graceful signal causes the parent process to advise the children to exit after their current request (or to exit immediately if they're not serving anything). The parent re-reads its configuration files and re-opens its log files. As each child dies off the parent replaces it with a child from the new generation of the configuration, which begins serving new requests immediately.
trans-unit.target: 该 USR1 或 graceful 信号使得父进程建议他们当前的请求后的孩子退出（或立即如果他们没有任何服务出口）。父级重新读取其配置文件并重新打开其日志文件。随着每个孩子的死亡，父级将其替换为新一代配置中的一个子级，该配置立即开始处理新请求。

trans-unit.source: The UndefMacro directive undefines a macro which has been defined before hand.
trans-unit.target: 该 UndefMacro 指令取消定义已事先定义的宏。

trans-unit.source: The Use directive controls the use of a macro. The specified macro is expanded. It must be given the same number of arguments as in the macro definition. The provided values are associated to their corresponding initial parameters and are substituted before processing.
trans-unit.target: 在 Use 指令控制使用宏。指定的宏被展开。必须为其提供与宏定义中相同数量的参数。提供的值与它们相应的初始参数相关联，并在处理之前被替换。

trans-unit.source: The User directive sets the user ID as which the server will answer requests. In order to use this directive, the server must be run initially as root. If you start the server as a non-root user, it will fail to change to the lesser privileged user, and will instead continue to run as that original user. If you do start the server as root, then it is normal for the parent process to remain running as root. Unix-userid is one of:
trans-unit.target: 该 User 指令设置用户ID作为服务器回答的请求。为了使用此伪指令，服务器必须首先以 root 身份运行。如果以非root用户身份启动服务器，它将无法更改为特权较低的用户，而是继续以该原始用户身份运行。如果确实以 root 身份启动服务器，那么父进程保持root身份正常运行是正常的。 Unix-userid 是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The UserDir directive sets the real directory in a user's home directory to use when a request for a document for a user is received. Directory-filename is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 UserDir 接收到的用户文档的请求时，指令设置在用户的主目录中的真实目录使用。目录文件名是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The VHostGroup directive sets the Unix group under which the server will process requests to a virtualhost. The group is set before the request is processed and reset afterwards using Solaris Privileges. Since the setting applies to the process, this is not compatible with threaded MPMs.
trans-unit.target: 该 VHostGroup 指令设置UNIX组在其下，服务器将处理请求的虚拟主机。该组在处理请求之前设置，然后使用Solaris Privileges重置。由于该设置适用于进程，因此它与线程MPM不兼容。

trans-unit.source: The VHostUser directive sets the Unix userid under which the server will process requests to a virtualhost. The userid is set before the request is processed and reset afterwards using Solaris Privileges. Since the setting applies to the process, this is not compatible with threaded MPMs.
trans-unit.target: 该 VHostUser 指令设置的Unix用户ID下的服务器将处理请求的虚拟主机。在处理请求之前设置用户ID，然后使用Solaris Privileges重置用户ID 。由于该设置适用于流程，因此与线程MPM不兼容。

trans-unit.source: The VersionSort keyword causes files containing version numbers to sort in a natural way. Strings are sorted as usual, except that substrings of digits in the name and description are compared according to their numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 该 VersionSort 关键字使包含版本号来排序以自然的方式的文件。字符串按常规排序，只是名称和描述中的数字子字符串根据其数字值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The VirtualDocumentRoot directive allows you to determine where Apache HTTP Server will find your documents based on the value of the server name. The result of expanding interpolated-directory is used as the root of the document tree in a similar manner to the DocumentRoot directive's argument. If interpolated-directory is none then VirtualDocumentRoot is turned off. This directive cannot be used in the same context as VirtualDocumentRootIP.
trans-unit.target: 在 VirtualDocumentRoot 指令允许你以确定Apache HTTP服务器将基于服务器名的值查找文档。扩展插值目录的结果以与 DocumentRoot 指令的参数类似的方式用作文档树的根。如果插值目录为 none ,则将关闭 VirtualDocumentRoot 。不能在与 VirtualDocumentRootIP 相同的上下文中使用此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: The VirtualDocumentRootIP directive is like the VirtualDocumentRoot directive, except that it uses the IP address of the server end of the connection for directory interpolation instead of the server name.
trans-unit.target: 该 VirtualDocumentRootIP 指令就像是 VirtualDocumentRoot 指令，不同之处在于它使用目录内插，而不是服务器名称连接的服务器端的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The VirtualScriptAlias directive allows you to determine where Apache httpd will find CGI scripts in a similar manner to VirtualDocumentRoot does for other documents. It matches requests for URIs starting /cgi-bin/, much like ScriptAlias/cgi-bin/ would.
trans-unit.target: 该 VirtualScriptAlias 指令允许您以确定的Apache httpd的会以同样的方式找到CGI脚本 VirtualDocumentRoot 确实为其他文件。它匹配以 /cgi-bin/ 开头的URI请求，就像 ScriptAlias /cgi-bin/ 那样。

trans-unit.source: The VirtualScriptAliasIP directive is like the VirtualScriptAlias directive, except that it uses the IP address of the server end of the connection for directory interpolation instead of the server name.
trans-unit.target: 该 VirtualScriptAliasIP 指令就像 VirtualScriptAlias 指令，不同之处在于它使用目录内插，而不是服务器名称连接的服务器端的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The WINCH or graceful-stop signal causes the parent process to advise the children to exit after their current request (or to exit immediately if they're not serving anything). The parent will then remove its PidFile and cease listening on all ports. The parent will continue to run, and monitor children which are handling requests. Once all children have finalised and exited or the timeout specified by the GracefulShutdownTimeout has been reached, the parent will also exit. If the timeout is reached, any remaining children will be sent the TERM signal to force them to exit.
trans-unit.target: 该 WINCH 或 graceful-stop 信号使父进程建议他们当前的请求后的孩子退出（或立即如果他们没有任何服务出口）。然后父级将删除其 PidFile 并停止侦听所有端口。父级将继续运行，并监视正在处理请求的子级。一旦所有子项都已完成并退出或达到 GracefulShutdownTimeout 指定的超时，父项也将退出。如果达到超时，则将向所有剩余的孩子发送 TERM 信号，以迫使他们退出。

trans-unit.source: The XBitHack directive controls the parsing of ordinary html documents. This directive only affects files associated with the MIME-typetext/html. XBitHack can take on the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该 XBitHack 指令控制的普通HTML文档解析。该伪指令仅影响与MIME类型的 text/html 相关的文件。 XBitHack 可以采用以下值：

trans-unit.source: The XHTML keyword forces mod_autoindex to emit XHTML 1.0 code instead of HTML 3.2. This option only has an effect if FancyIndexing is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: 的 XHTML 关键字力 mod_autoindex 发射XHTML 1.0代码，而不是HTML 3.2。仅当还启用了 FancyIndexing 时,此选项才有效。

trans-unit.source: The [F]RewriteRule flag causes a 403 Forbidden response to be sent. Using this, you can deny access to a resource based on arbitrary criteria.
trans-unit.target: 的 [F] RewriteRule 标志使被发送的403禁止响应。使用此功能，您可以基于任意条件拒绝对资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: The all provider mimics the functionality that was previously provided by the 'Allow from all' and 'Deny from all' directives. This provider can take one of two arguments which are 'granted' or 'denied'. The following examples will grant or deny access to all requests.
trans-unit.target: 在 all 供应商模仿先前由“从所有允许”提供，并且指示“从全部拒绝”的功能。该提供程序可以采用“授予”或“拒绝”两个参数之一。以下示例将授予或拒绝对所有请求的访问。

trans-unit.source: The apachectl script can operate in two modes. First, it can act as a simple front-end to the httpd command that simply sets any necessary environment variables and then invokes httpd, passing through any command line arguments. Second, apachectl can act as a SysV init script, taking simple one-word arguments like start, restart, and stop, and translating them into appropriate signals to httpd.
trans-unit.target: 该 apachectl 脚本可以在两种模式下工作。首先，它可以充当 httpd 命令的简单前端，该命令简单地设置任何必要的环境变量，然后通过任何命令行参数调用 httpd 。其次， apachectl 可以充当SysV初始化脚本，采用简单的一词参数，例如 start ， restart 和 stop ，并将其转换为适当的信号到 httpd 。

trans-unit.source: The apachectl script returns a 0 exit value on success, and >0 if an error occurs. For more details, view the comments in the script.
trans-unit.target: 所述 apachectl 如果发生错误脚本成功返回0退出值，和> 0。有关更多详细信息，请查看脚本中的注释。

trans-unit.source: The attributes are optional and have the following structure:
trans-unit.target: 这些 attributes 是可选的，并具有以下结构：

trans-unit.source: The balancer:// scheme is what tells httpd that we are creating a balancer set, with the name myset. It includes 2 backend servers, which httpd calls BalancerMembers. In this case, any requests for /images will be proxied to one of the 2 backends. The ProxySet directive specifies that the myset Balancer use a load balancing algorithm that balances based on I/O bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该 balancer:// 方案是什么告诉httpd的，我们正在创建一个平衡器集，名为MYSET。它包含2个后端服务器，httpd称为BalancerMembers。在这种情况下，对于任何请求 /images 将被代理到一个 2个后端。该 ProxySet 指令指定MYSET平衡器使用负载平衡算法，基于I / O字节余额。

trans-unit.source: The brk(2) calls allocate memory from the heap. It is rare to see these in a system call trace, because the httpd uses custom memory allocators (apr_pool and apr_bucket_alloc) for most request processing. In this trace, the httpd has just been started, so it must call malloc(3) to get the blocks of raw memory with which to create the custom memory allocators.
trans-unit.target: 的 brk(2) 的呼叫从堆中分配内存。在系统调用跟踪中很少见到这些，因为httpd 在大多数请求处理中都使用了自定义内存分配器（ apr_pool 和 apr_bucket_alloc ）。在此跟踪中，httpd刚刚启动，因此它必须调用 malloc(3) 来获取用于创建自定义内存分配器的原始内存块。

trans-unit.source: The check_forensic script takes as its argument the name of the logfile. It looks for those +/- ID pairs and complains if a request was not completed.
trans-unit.target: 该 check_forensic 脚本作为其参数的日志文件的名称。它看起来对那些 + / - ID对和抱怨，如果未完成的请求。

trans-unit.source: The check_forensic script, which can be found in the distribution's support directory, may be helpful in evaluating the forensic log output.
trans-unit.target: 该 check_forensic 脚本，它可以在分布的支持目录中找到，可能是在评估法医日志输出很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: The cmd= keyword allows you to specify the external command to run. If there are arguments after the program name, the command line should be surrounded in quotation marks (e.g., cmd="/bin/mypgm arg1 arg2".) Normal shell quoting is not necessary since the program is run directly, bypassing the shell. Program arguments are blank-delimited. A backslash can be used to escape blanks which should be part of a program argument. Any backslashes which are part of the argument must be escaped with backslash themselves. In addition to the standard CGI environment variables, DOCUMENT_URI, DOCUMENT_PATH_INFO, and QUERY_STRING_UNESCAPED will also be set for the program.
trans-unit.target: 使用 cmd= 关键字可以指定要运行的外部命令。如果程序名称后面有参数，则命令行应用引号引起来（例如， cmd="/bin/mypgm arg1 arg2" 。）由于程序是直接运行而绕过Shell，因此不需要常规的 Shell引号。程序参数用空格分隔。反斜杠可用于转义空格，空格应作为程序参数的一部分。作为参数一部分的任何反斜杠必须自己使用反斜杠进行转义。除了标准的CGI环境变量外，还将为程序设置DOCUMENT_URI，DOCUMENT_PATH_INFO和QUERY_STRING_UNESCAPED。

trans-unit.source: The configure script configures the source tree for compiling and installing the Apache HTTP Server on your particular platform. Various options allow the compilation of a server corresponding to your personal requirements.
trans-unit.target: 该 configure 脚本配置源代码树编译和您的特定平台上安装Apache HTTP服务器。各种选项允许根据您的个人需求编译服务器。

trans-unit.source: The configure script is run normally but does not create output files. This is useful to check the test results before generating makefiles for compilation.
trans-unit.target: 该 configure 脚本运行正常，但不创建输出文件。这对于在生成用于编译的makefile之前检查测试结果很有用。

trans-unit.source: The content-length header is extremely important. If it is present and non-zero, the container assumes that the request has a body (a POST request, for example), and immediately reads a separate packet off the input stream to get that body.
trans-unit.target: 的 content-length 报头是极其重要的。如果存在且不为零，则容器假定该请求具有主体（例如POST请求），并立即从输入流中读取一个单独的数据包以获取该主体。

trans-unit.source: The context and servlet_path are not currently set by the C code, and most of the Java code completely ignores whatever is sent over for those fields (and some of it will actually break if a string is sent along after one of those codes). I don't know if this is a bug or an unimplemented feature or just vestigial code, but it's missing from both sides of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在 context 和 servlet_path 目前没有被C代码设置，并且无论是在发送这些字段（如果字符串沿着这些代码中的一个后发的一些它实际上将打破）大部分的Java代码的完全忽略。我不知道这是错误还是未实现的功能，或者仅仅是残留代码，但连接的两边都没有。

trans-unit.source: The decoding attribute must precede the corresponding var attribute to be effective.
trans-unit.target: 的 decoding 属性必须先于相应的 var 属性是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The disabled argument is available in version 2.4.4 and later
trans-unit.target: 该 disabled 参数是在版本2.4.4及更高版本

trans-unit.source: The echo function just spits out the value of a variable. There are a number of standard variables, which include the whole set of environment variables that are available to CGI programs. Also, you can define your own variables with the set function.
trans-unit.target: 该 echo 功能只吐出一个变量的值。有许多标准变量，包括CGI程序可用的整套环境变量。另外，您可以使用 set 函数定义自己的变量。

trans-unit.source: The elif or else statements are used to put text into the output stream if the original test_condition was false. These elements are optional.
trans-unit.target: 该 elif 或 else 语句用于将文本到输出流，如果原来的 test_condition 是假的。这些元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The encoding attribute must precede the corresponding var attribute to be effective.
trans-unit.target: 的 encoding 属性必须先于相应的 var 属性是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The endif element ends the if element and is required.
trans-unit.target: 所述 endif 元件结束 if 元件和是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The env provider allows access to the server to be controlled based on the existence of an environment variable. When Require env env-variable is specified, then the request is allowed access if the environment variable env-variable exists. The server provides the ability to set environment variables in a flexible way based on characteristics of the client request using the directives provided by mod_setenvif. Therefore, this directive can be used to allow access based on such factors as the clients User-Agent (browser type), Referer, or other HTTP request header fields.
trans-unit.target: 在 env 提供商允许基于一个的存在要被控制对服务器的访问环境变量。当指定 Require env env-variable 时，如果环境变量 env-variable 存在，则允许访问请求。服务器可以使用 mod_setenvif 提供的指令，根据客户端请求的特征灵活地设置环境变量。因此，该指令可用于允许基于客户端 User-Agent （浏览器类型）， Referer 或其他HTTP请求标头字段等因素进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The exec command executes a given shell command or CGI script. It requires mod_cgi to be present in the server. If OptionsIncludesNOEXEC is set, this command is completely disabled. The valid attributes are:
trans-unit.target: 在 exec 命令执行给定的shell命令或CGI脚本。它要求 mod_cgi 存在于服务器中。如果设置了 Options IncludesNOEXEC ，则此命令将完全禁用。有效属性是：

trans-unit.source: The expr provider allows basing authorization decisions on arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: 该 expr 提供者允许任意表达式基础的授权决定。

trans-unit.source: The f flag causes mod_substitute to flatten the result of a substitution allowing for later substitutions to take place on the boundary of this one. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 所述 f 标志导致 mod_substitute 变平的取代允许以后取代发生这一个的边界上的结果。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The forward-dns provider allows access to the server to be controlled based on simple host names. When Require forward-dns host-name is specified, all IP addresses corresponding to host-name are allowed access.
trans-unit.target: 在 forward-dns 提供商允许基于简单的主机名来控制对服务器的访问。如果指定了 Require forward-dns host-name ，则允许访问与该 host-name 相对应的所有IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The forward-dns provider was addded in 2.4.19
trans-unit.target: 在 forward-dns 提供商在2.4.19 addded

trans-unit.source: The forward-dns provider was added in 2.4.19.
trans-unit.target: 在 forward-dns 提供商在2.4.19添加。

trans-unit.source: The graceful-stop signal allows you to run multiple identically configured instances of httpd at the same time. This is a powerful feature when performing graceful upgrades of httpd, however it can also cause deadlocks and race conditions with some configurations.
trans-unit.target: 在 graceful-stop 信号，让你运行多个相同配置的情况下 httpd 在同一时间。在执行httpd的正常升级时，这是一项强大的功能，但是在某些配置下，它也会导致死锁和竞争情况。

trans-unit.source: The gzip encoding is the only one supported to ensure complete compatibility with old browser implementations. The deflate encoding is not supported, please check the zlib's documentation for a complete explanation.
trans-unit.target: 该 gzip 的编码是唯一一个支持，以确保与旧的浏览器实现完全兼容。该 deflate 不支持的编码，请检查zlib的文档的完整的解释。

trans-unit.source: The host provider allows access to the server to be controlled based on the host name of the remote client. When Require host host-name is specified, then the request is allowed access if the host name matches.
trans-unit.target: 该 host 提供商允许基于远程客户端的主机名来控制对服务器的访问。当指定 Require host host-name ，如果主机名匹配，则允许访问请求。

trans-unit.source: The httpd.conf should contain the following:
trans-unit.target: 在 httpd.conf 中应包含以下内容：

trans-unit.source: The httpd RPM is the only RPM necessary to get a basic server to run. Install it as follows:
trans-unit.target: 该 httpd 的 RPM要得到一个基本的服务器来运行只有RPM。如下安装：

trans-unit.source: The httpready accept filter buffers entire HTTP requests at the kernel level. Once an entire request is received, the kernel then sends it to the server. See the accf_http(9) man page for more details. Since HTTPS requests are encrypted, only the accf_data(9) filter is used.
trans-unit.target: 该 httpready 在内核级别接受滤波器缓冲器整个HTTP请求。一旦接收到整个请求，内核便将其发送到服务器。有关更多详细信息，请参见accf_http（9）手册页。由于HTTPS请求已加密，因此仅使用accf_data（9）过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The httpready accept filter buffers entire HTTP requests at the kernel level. Once an entire request is received, the kernel then sends it to the server. See the accf_http(9) man page for more details. Since HTTPS requests are encrypted, only the accf_data(9) filter is used.

The if element works like an if statement in a programming language. The test condition is evaluated and if the result is true, then the text until the next elif, else or endif element is included in the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 该 if 元素就像一个编程语言中的if语句。评估测试条件，如果结果为true，则文本直到下一个 elif ， else 或 endif 元素包括在输出流中。

trans-unit.source: The ip provider allows access to the server to be controlled based on the IP address of the remote client. When Require ip ip-address is specified, then the request is allowed access if the IP address matches.
trans-unit.target: 该 ip 供应商允许基于远程客户端的IP地址来控制对服务器的访问。当指定 Require ip ip-address 时，如果IP地址匹配，则允许访问请求。

trans-unit.source: The jvm_route, is used to support sticky sessions -- associating a user's sesson with a particular Tomcat instance in the presence of multiple, load-balancing servers.
trans-unit.target: 该 jvm_route ，用于支持粘性会话-关联用户与多个，负载平衡服务器存在一个特定的Tomcat实例雪村。

trans-unit.source: The local provider allows access to the server if any of the following conditions is true:

trans-unit.source: The method provider allows using the HTTP method in authorization decisions. The GET and HEAD methods are treated as equivalent. The TRACE method is not available to this provider, use TraceEnable instead.
